name: Magic Kaleidoscope
description:
The Magic Kaleidoscope is an amazing anti-stress coloring game where you can become the creator of your own magical textures and animations.




Mathematical formulas and fractals breathe life into a unique animated library of materials, creating magnificent and vibrant pictures.



Customize your settings, play with colors, sizes, and animation speed to make each of your creations unique and one-of-a-kind.

Moreover, you can share your masterpieces with friends!

Just copy the code, send it to your friend, and they can enjoy your magical kaleidoscope.



You can also use the results of your experiments as a background in videos, create unique avatars, or set up a festive atmosphere using a projector.



The Magic Kaleidoscope is art, imagination development, and an engaging way to relieve stress for both children and adults.



Forget about everyday problems and dive into an endless ocean of colors and shapes!
